title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 190-8.1 - Statement to employee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 190-8.1 - Statement to employee

State Regulations

For each payroll period every employer shall furnish to
each employee a statement showing the following: (a) full name and address of the
employer; (b) name of the
employee; (c) hours worked by the
employee; (d) when wages are based
on piece rate, the size or weight of the piece-rate unit and the number of
units produced during the pay period; (e) rates paid; (f) gross wages; (g) allowances and deductions; and
(h) net wages. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
190-8.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
